riskmetric 0.2.0

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

riskmetric 0.2.0

  • We now have a Hex Logo! #233. Thanks to @AARON-CLARK.
  • Number of download assessment can now take a specified number of days. #258. Thanks to @parmsam-pfizer.
  • A new assessment was added for determining the size of the codebase. #66. Thanks to @shengwei66.
  • Fixed an issue of some scores returning negative numbers instead of values between [0,1]. Thanks to @emilliman5.
  • A new assessment was added for the presens of a bug report URL for the package. Thanks to @kimjj93.
  • A new assessment was added to score the dependency footprint of a package. Thanks to @emilliman5.

riskmetric 0.1.22022-01-28

  • Hotfix release to correct testing suite such that tests are less continent on assumptions of locally installed packages, addressing build issues on CRAN builders. (#223, @elimillera)

riskmetric 0.1.12021-07-29

  • Fixing a bug with subclassing of pkg_ref objects using the new concrete constructors. (#208, @dgkf)

riskmetric 0.1.02021-05-13

  • Initial version.
  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.

Contents

Developed by R Validation Hub, Doug Kelkhoff, Marly Gotti, Eli Miller, Kevin K, Yilong Zhang, Eric Milliman, Juliane Manitz.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
